message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,500. It's a great deal, as you know the value of this product. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only commit to a maximum of $10,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,500. It's a fair price, considering the value of this product to you. Let's see if we can make this work.
